title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for chatting, embedding, pulling, and managing Ollama models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library exposing chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete, and model creation endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous/asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter for local LLM integration.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built Node CLI for listing, pulling, and chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private code completion.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async chat, generate, and embeddings; targets .NET 6+.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama; includes model selector and token-per-second metrics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings for the Ollama REST API; includes tokio support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stack adding GPU support, Open WebUI, and persistent volumes for easy local deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama and WebUI to Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a private RAG system using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that routes user prompts to Ollama with per-guild model selection and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes or answer questions using a local model.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n community node for no-code workflows that can chat, generate text, or create embeddings via Ollama.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift menubar app for macOS that starts/stops Ollama server, shows GPU usage, and offers quick chat window.
